name: Cut 'em Down
description:
Those pesky are so annoying with their sparklyness and their happy-go-lucky attitude. Oh look, one of them is persistent enough to think she can take you and your army on. Well, you can't have that.

Send your minions to shoot the fairy down. Stall her as long as possible before she reaches you, the final boss.

It's like a shoot 'em up, only backwards.

Controls: This is a mouse-only game.
